note.snippet: Na vattabbaṃ – ‘‘addhā parinipphannoti? Āmantā. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā – ‘‘tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, kathāvatthūni! Katamāni tīṇi? Atītaṃ vā, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheyya – ‘evaṃ ahosi atītamaddhāna’nti; anāgataṃ vā, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheyya – ‘evaṃ bhavissati anāgatamaddhāna’nti; etarahi vā, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheyya – ‘evaṃ hoti etarahi paccuppanna’nti. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kathāvatthūnī’’ti
Aññaṃ kammaṃ añño kammūpacayoti, āmantā. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā – ‘‘idha, puṇṇa, ekacco sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi
